about_the_game:
Build a vehicle from found objects, grow your inventory, make friends and help everyone get to the safe zones through a dangerous world filled with deadly creatures and traps. At each stop you have the chance to help a hitchhiker get to a new location and in return you have their skills at your disposal if you can keep them safe. Traverse the world with a metroidvania style gameplay where you may not have all the equipment to reach all places at first. Meet interesting characters. Build your vehicles to keep your pilots safe.

Play a single player story or play locally with friends as a couch party game.

Single player:
-Rich story
-Metroidvania style gameplay
-Environmental puzzles
-Fun with physics

Multiplayer:
-Build battle vehicles and combat friends on dedicated battle arena maps
